job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties met behulp van het Laravel/Vue-framework
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications using specific frameworks, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's aan end-to-end AI-applicatieontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the complete lifecycle of AI application development, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van low-code platforms zoals n8n en Flutterflow i.c.m. je fullcode ervaring en skills
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning low-code, it emphasizes the integration with full-code experience and skills, still pertaining to the development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the need to understand business needs and translate technical AI concepts into client-facing solutions, indicating business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: This refers to improving the methodology of software development services, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's
Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen
Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes software development using Laravel/Vue and mentions AI applications, but lacks specific details about generative models, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning. The core responsibilities lean towards general software engineering with an AI component, rather than specialized GenAI development.
